decoworld.server.achievements

Class AchievementController

  • java.lang.Object
    • decoworld.server.achievements.AchievementController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    decoworld.model.world.combat.events.HealthListener, decoworld.model.world.combat.events.LevelUpListener

    public class AchievementController
extends java.lang.Object
implements decoworld.model.world.combat.events.HealthListener, decoworld.model.world.combat.events.LevelUpListener
    This class is meant to handle every achievement-related event. Read the wiki to see how to implement your own achievements, and how to implement the AchievementListner

      • setAchievementCompleted

        public void setAchievementCompleted(decoworld.protocol.resources.ClientConnection client,
                           java.lang.String achievementTitle)
        Set an achievement completed for a particular player. Do nothing if the achievement is already completed
        Parameters:
        ClientConnection - client The connection with the player
        String - achievementTitle The achievement title as defined is the manager

      • setAchievementStatus

        public void setAchievementStatus(decoworld.protocol.resources.ClientConnection client,
                        java.lang.String achievementTitle,
                        java.lang.String status)
        Change (or add) the status of an achievement for a player
        Parameters:
        ClientConnection - client The connection with the player
        String - achievementTitle The achievement title as defined is the manager
        String - status The new status to be added to the DB

      • getAchievementStatus

        public java.lang.String getAchievementStatus(decoworld.protocol.resources.ClientConnection client,
                                    java.lang.String achievementTitle)
        Get the current status of an achievement for a player
        Parameters:
        ClientConnection - client The connection with the player
        String - achievementTitle The achievement title as defined is the manager
        Returns:
        - the current status of an achievement for a particular player - "INACTIVE": there is no tuple in the DB corresponding to this client.username/achievementTitle - "ERROR": error connecting to DB

      • achievementIsActive

        public int achievementIsActive(decoworld.protocol.resources.ClientConnection client,
                      java.lang.String achievementTitle)
        Return a boolean value indicating is the achievement is active or not, or a negative integer describing an error
        Parameters:
        ClientConnection - client The connection with the player
        String - achievementTitle The achievement title as defined is the manager
        Returns:
        0 : not started yet 1 : active -1 : is already completed -2 : client is null -3 : error connecting to database

        public void playerDied(decoworld.protocol.resources.ClientConnection client)
